Test.Name: Exchange Versions
Test.Description: Exchange Analyzer supports Exchange Server 2013 and 2016.
Test.IfInfoComments: One or more Exchange servers exist that are not running Exchange 2013 or 2016.
Test.IfPassedComments: All Exchange servers in the organization are Exchange 2013/2016.

Test.Name: Build Numbers
Test.Description: Check if Exchange Servers are running the latest build.
Test.IfPassedComments: All Exchange Server 2013/2016 servers are running the latest build.
Test.IfWarningComments: One or more Exchange Server 2013/2016 servers are not running the latest build.
Test.IfFailedComments: One or more Exchange Server 2013/2016 servers are not running the latest build.

Test.Name: Client Access Namespaces
Test.Description: Check if multiple namespaces exist for a protocol within the same AD site.
Test.IfPassedComments: All Exchange sites have a single namespace per HTTPS protocol.
Test.IfFailedComments: One or more Exchange sites has more than one namespace per HTTPS protocol.

Test.Name: Server FQDNs in URLs
Test.Description: Check that CAS URLs don't contain server FQDNs.
Test.IfPassedComments: No Exchange HTTPS services have URLs containing server FQDNs.
Test.IfFailedComments: One or more Exchange HTTPS services has a URL containing server FQDNs.

Test.Name: Database Backups
Test.Description: Check that a database backup has been run in the last 24 hours.
Test.IfPassedComments: All mailbox databases have been backed up within the last 24 hours.
Test.IfFailedComments: One or more Exchange databases has not been backed up within the last 24 hours.

Test.Name: AD Domain Level
Test.Description: Check that the domains are at the required level.
Test.IfPassedComments: All Active Directory domains meet the required functional level.
Test.IfFailedComments: One or more Active Directory domains do not meet the required functional level.

Test.Name: AD Forest Level
Test.Description: Check that the forest is at the required level.
Test.IfPassedComments: The Active Directory forest meets the required functional level.
Test.IfFailedComments: The Active Directory forest does not meet the required functional level.

Test.Name: PageFile Min Max Check
Test.Description: Check that the PageFile Maximum and Minimum sizes are the same.
Test.IfPassedComments: The PageFile Maximum and Minimum sizes are the same.
Test.IfFailedComments: The PageFile Maximum and Minimum sizes are not set the same.
